metadata.value:
Auth0 Developer
at Hitachi Vantara Corporation (View all jobs)

Meet our Team

We are the Identity and Access Management team, part of Cybersecurity at Hitachi Vantara, and we are passionate advocates of cybersecurity! We maintain key tools and software in our corporate environment that ensures the proper identity and access management of our employees, vendors, customers, and partners. We are out-of-the-box thinkers, innovators, and team players. We constantly seek new and better ways of doing things. We need highly motivated individuals to join our dynamic team who have positive attitudes and want to be part of something special. We strive for nothing less than the very best IAM program!

What you’ll be doing

As an experienced, technically sound Auth0 Developer, you will join a squad of IAM developers and engineers, reporting to the Senior Manager of Identity and Access Management. Working closely with other teams and tools including Partner and Customer Experience, Salesforce, and Auth0, you will help to mature the Consumer Identity and Access Management program at Hitachi Vantara.

As an expert at managing, configuring, and developing CIAM platforms, you will be responsible for helping us design, test, and implement Auth0 as the chosen solution for managing external identity at Hitachi Vantara. This will include designing and maintaining workflows around user registration, progressive profiling, inbound federation, sign in policies, custom authorization servers, role management, webhooks, and token validation. To be a great fit for this role you should be comfortable and knowledgeable regarding the challenges of B2B, B2C, and other IAM ecosystems.

We are looking for a technical expert ready to take ownership of building a new platform for our external user base!

Your tasks will also include:

Creating, reviewing, and maintaining custom and complex OAuth and OIDC integrations with Auth0.

Completing SAML integrations with custom rule and attribute statements using Auth0 as an IdP.

Evaluating, improving, and maintaining our external user experience.

Developing Okta Workflows to supplement native provisioning and registration processes.

Developing custom rules and actions within Auth0 to interact with external platforms.

Development and maintenance of Terraform and CI/CD pipelines.

Writing custom Node.js functions to enhance the Auth0 implementation.

Development and maintenance of critical CIAM applications user Express and Node JS.

Developing integrations to Auth0 Fine Grain Authorization platform.

What you bring to the team

Strong/expert level understanding of authentication mechanisms and protocols including OIDC/OAuth and SAML, and key related security concepts such as MFA, and how these are used with Auth0 and other IdPs, and the ability to trouble shoot issues in this realm.

Strong/expert level experience integrating applications with Auth0 for SSO

Hands on experience (2+ years) with Auth0 within large enterprise scale environments (with more than 10,000 users), including also experience with workflows and/or scripting with Public facing APIs (to allow for automation of tasks)

Hands-on experience in one or more of the following areas: web (JavaScript, HTML, frontend frameworks) development, mobile (iOS, Android) development, backend (Java, C#, Node.js, or Python) development, IP-based real-time communications, API development

Great interpersonal skills: good written & oral communication in English, ability & willingness to work within international team, collaborative & team-oriented approach, being self-driven with an ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and variables in a dynamic and fast moving, large scale project with tight deadlines, multiple priorities and under defined budget, high attention to details and quality.

Our Company

Hitachi Vantara is part of the Global Hitachi family. We balance innovation with an open, friendly culture and the backing of a long-established parent company, known for its ethical reputation.  We guide customers from what’s now to what’s next by unlocking the value of their data and applications to solve their digital challenges, achieving outcomes that benefit both business and society.

Our people are our biggest asset, they drive our innovation advantage, and we strive to offer a flexible and collaborative workplace where they can thrive.  Diversity of thought is welcomed, and our employee base is represented by several active Employee Resource Group communities.  We offer industry leading benefits packages and promote a creative and inclusive culture.  If driving real change gives you a sense of pride and you are passionate about powering social good, we’d love to hear from you.

Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion 
Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We want to help you take care of your today and tomorrow – at home and at work. Which is why we offer industry-leading benefits that go far beyond compensation. Here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. At Hitachi Vantara, we value the diversity of our workforce and strive to foster an inclusive environment in which talent from all backgrounds can thrive, bringing their unique contributions to our culture and success. We are an equal opportunity employer and seek to strengthen our hiring practices by identifying and mitigating the potential for bias in our assessment and selection processes.

Below is a set of voluntary demographic questions that, if you choose to complete, will provide aggregated data to inform our hiring strategy and help us uphold our commitment to inclusive hiring.  Your responses, or choice to not respond, will in no way be linked to your specific application and will not be used to inform the hiring decision.

Our company does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression or veteran status. In order to track the effectiveness of our recruiting efforts and ensure we consider the needs of all our employees, please consider the following optional questions.
